translations: 猛扔，猛摔；大声说出（辱骂或斥责等）；呕吐
<非正式>乘车，搭便车；猛投，投掷

sentences.sentence: It took only one heave to hurl him into the river.
sentences.translation: 只是一推，就把他推进了河里。

sentences.sentence: In this context, generosity has come to mean that you hurl money around like a drunken sailor.
sentences.translation: 在这种情况下，慷慨意味着你像喝醉了的水手一样乱扔钱。
